drep.description: Mirai Blockchain Group (MBCG) specializes in Cardano blockchain development and node management, offering services such as staking, wallet setup, and community engagement.
drep.objectives: To promote community-driven governance and enhance transparency in blockchain decision-making.
drep.motivations: To support the Cardano ecosystem by providing informed and community-focused representation.
drep.qualifications: Experienced in blockchain technology, governance, and community engagement.
